comment: Smart Data Models - OutdoorAirConditioner schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ZEB/master/OutdoorAirConditioner/schema.json
description: Information on OutdoorAirConditioner (maker, model, specification, etc.).
